Account Id.description: The unique identifier for the Bing Ads account.

Id.description: The unique identifier for the keyword.

Ad Group.description: The name of the ad group where the keyword belongs.

Bid.description: The bid amount set for the keyword.

Bid Strategy Type.description: The type of bid strategy used for the keyword.

Campaign.description: The campaign name where the keyword is associated.

Client Id.description: The client identifier linked to the keyword.

Custom Parameter.description: A custom parameter associated with the keyword.

Destination Url.description: The destination URL for the keyword.

Modified Time.description: The timestamp when the keyword was last modified.

Editorial Appeal Status.description: The appeal status of the keyword during the editorial review process.

Editorial Location.description: The location of the editorial review for the keyword.

Editorial Reason Code.description: The reason code provided during the editorial review process.

Editorial Status.description: The editorial status of the keyword.

Editorial Term.description: The term that was reviewed editorially.

Final Url.description: The final URL that the keyword points to.

Final Url Suffix.description: The URL suffix added to the final URL.

Inherited Bid Strategy Type.description: The bid strategy type inherited for the keyword.

Keyword Relevance.description: The relevance of the keyword to its ad group or campaign.

Landing Page Relevance.description: The relevance of the landing page to the keyword.

Landing Page User Experience.description: The user experience on the landing page related to the keyword.

Match Type.description: The match type of the keyword (e.g., exact, phrase, broad).

Mobile Final Url.description: The final URL for mobile devices.

Parent Id.description: The parent identifier to which the keyword belongs.

Publisher Countries.description: The countries targeted for publishing the keyword.

Quality Score.description: The quality score assigned to the keyword.

Status.description: The current status of the keyword.

Tracking Template.description: The template used for tracking the performance of the keyword.
